translation.en: This morning, we set sail for our next grand adventure, the Galapagos,
translation.zh:
‎今早我们航行前往科隆群岛
‎展开下一场大冒险

translation.en: and whatever extraordinary creatures await me on these islands.
translation.zh:
‎这些岛上有许多不可思议的生物
‎等着我发掘

translation.en: Ooh, uh, Ed? This is embarrassing.
Um, but you have a little, um...
-Yeah, right there. You got it. -Uh, I know.
translation.zh:
‎-就在那边 你抓到了
‎-我知道

‎-它不会有事的
‎-老弟 快点

translation.en: The other flummels are waiting for us.
So, we're late. What's the worst thing that could happen?
translation.zh: ‎我们迟到了 有什么大不了的？

translation.en: The countdown to the Flower Festival has begun.
Now, I know we don't have a lot of flowers, but--
translation.zh: ‎虽然我们摘到的花不多 但是…

translation.en: But the ones we got are different, dynamic, and--
Weird. The flowers, you, your brother, all weird.
translation.zh: ‎奇奇怪怪 你姐弟俩都奇奇怪怪

translation.en: That's why no one wants you around.
translation.zh: ‎所以大家都不想看到你们在场

translation.en: Well, Ed, we gave it a shot.
[scoffs] It's fine. I don't care what Mali thinks.
translation.zh: ‎算了 我不在乎玛丽的想法

translation.en: [chuckles] What are you talking about? You care what everybody thinks.
translation.zh:
‎你说什么呢？
‎你明明很在乎其他菲拉萌的想法

translation.en: Not right now, because I've got a big surprise for you.
translation.zh:
‎起码这一刻不在乎
‎因为我给你准备了一个大惊喜

translation.en: It's an official headdress for my new job.
When we all march up the mountain for the Flower Festival,
translation.zh: ‎百花节当天 我走上山之际

translation.en: I'll be in one of the most important spots...
Because I've been chosen to be...
-No, it's the opposite, it's the finish. -Still, it's an honor.
translation.zh:
‎-不是 正好相反 是终点
‎-但仍然是个荣幸

‎-你是怎么被选中的？
‎-被随机挑中的

translation.en: You know what would make it even better?
translation.zh: ‎你知道怎么做能让你更好受吗？

translation.en: but this is my final chance to make a good impression with the rest of the flummels.
translation.zh: ‎但这是我最后一次在其他菲拉萌面前 ‎留下好印象的机会

translation.en: And don't take this the wrong way, but, please, just try not to ruin this for me.
translation.zh:
‎希望你不会误解我
‎这次请你不要搞破坏 好吗？

translation.en: Well, whenever you help, things tend to... unravel.
Waterfall fail, mango avalanche, rock in the hole,
translation.zh:
‎瀑布灾难、芒果山崩
‎洞洞被石头堵住

translation.en: the great fire, the greater fire,
mud for dinner, tree skis, the burpening, fish for hands,
translation.zh:
‎吃泥、滑树意外
‎疯狂打嗝、徒手钓鱼

translation.en: the ring thing, bee tornado, bee tornado two: the tropical swarm,
translation.zh:
‎环环相扣、龙卷“蜂”
‎再见龙卷“蜂”之热带狂蜂

translation.en: and, of course, Coconut Charlie and the Jackfruit Jam Band.
translation.zh:
‎当然不得不提
‎香椰查理和菠萝蜜酱乐队

translation.en: So we've had our ups and downs. Mainly downs.
translation.zh:
‎-说明我们一起经历过甘苦
‎-通常是苦

translation.en: But think of those sweet, sweet occasional ups.
translation.zh: ‎试着想象那些美好的快乐时光嘛

translation.en: And besides, you need to stop living in the past...
I just wanted to say, I like that spin move you do.
translation.zh: ‎我只想跟你说 我喜欢你的旋转动作

translation.en: Oh, thanks! I call it the "Op Pop".
translation.zh: ‎感谢夸奖 那个动作叫“奥普跳”

translation.en: -I can teach you, if you want. -You could?
translation.zh:
‎-你想学的话 我可以教你
‎-真的吗？

translation.en: Sure! Just do what I do.
translation.zh: ‎没问题 跟着我做就对了

translation.en: Bo, what have I told you about wandering off?
translation.zh:
‎小波 你总是到处乱跑
‎妈妈说过什么来着？

translation.en: Fred, looking good. You working out?
translation.zh: ‎弗雷德 好精神 最近在健身吗？

translation.en: -Did you change your fur? -I combed it.
Get ready to give your undivided attention to the roundest guy around,
translation.zh:
‎准备好 请把焦点都集中在
‎世界上最浑圆的菲拉萌身上

translation.en: the king ring of our hoop troop,
translation.zh: ‎有请我们圈圈界的圈圈之王

translation.en: Hey, thank you, Mali. Thanks a bunch, great stuff.
translation.zh: ‎谢了 玛丽 感谢各位 好样的

translation.en: Hey, everybody. All right, a little story just before we begin.
translation.zh:
‎各位 正式开幕前
‎我给大家说个小故事

translation.en: Last night, I was doing some thinking, I was doing some math.
translation.zh: ‎昨晚 我想了又想 算了又算

translation.en: That guy gets it. I like that guy.
So anywho, I decided our theme this year,
translation.zh:
‎话说回来
‎我已经为今年百花节设定主题

translation.en: just like every other year, is...
All right. Cheer time is over.
And as always, I, and the Grand Flower Flummel,
translation.zh: ‎一如既往 我和菲拉萌巨型花车

translation.en: will lead us right to the top of the mountain to celebrate.
translation.zh: ‎将带领大家一路前往山顶举办庆典

translation.en: big flummels and small flummels, flummels who love the beach,
translation.zh: ‎无论大小 只要热爱海滩的菲拉萌

translation.en: but especially the part where the sand is a little firmer...
translation.zh: ‎尤其是那种沙滩较稳实的海滩…

translation.en: [grunts] I told you that branch wouldn't hold us.
translation.zh:
‎我说过了
‎那支树枝撑不起我们的重量

translation.en: I don't remember you saying that.
We've been demoted to crab poking.
translation.zh: ‎我们被降级了 如今只有戳螃蟹的份

translation.en: Well, hey, at least you still have your job as the "buddy in the back".
translation.zh: ‎起码你还保住了“队尾之兄”的岗位

translation.en: you're gonna be asked for a lot of dances.
translation.zh: ‎肯定会有很多女生跟你邀舞的

translation.en: I get nervous talking to girls that aren't you.
translation.zh:
‎只要跟你以外的女生说话
‎我都会紧张

translation.en: I can't even talk to Vinny since he grew his hair long.
translation.zh: ‎我连留长发后的文尼也不敢面对

translation.en: Hey, what's-- Looking good. Looking good.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 这是…你看起来真精神

translation.en: I wanna hear what's been happening.
Hey, Op, I'm coming. Don't you worry. We haven't talked since yesterday.
translation.zh:
‎奥普 我来了 别激动
‎我们从昨天到现在都没聊过

translation.en: So, there's a lot to catch up on.
-First off-- -Uh, he's coming in pretty hot.
translation.zh:
‎-首先…
‎-他往这边直直冲过来了

translation.en: Towards the beach. All right, where all the Flummels are working.
translation.zh:
‎他往海滩冲过来了
‎所有菲拉萌都在海滩忙着呢

translation.en: Ah, you're right. Better shoo him off a bit.
translation.zh: ‎你说得对 我还是赶紧叫他退后点

translation.en: [Wally] But let's be honest, it's all just swimming.
translation.zh: ‎说真的 不过是游泳 不是吗？

translation.en: You can't call it a school and expect kids to be excited about it.
translation.zh: ‎我们总不能期待小朋友喜欢上学吧

translation.en: -That's the same thing! -No, that was waving.
-This is a shooing motion. -No, it isn't.
translation.zh:
‎-这是叫他退后的手势
‎-才不是呢

translation.en: This is a shooing motion! More like this.
translation.zh: ‎这才是叫他退后的手势 这样才对
‎小金 你的姿势也摆得很好

translation.en: And guess what? Mr. Seahorse is having a baby!
translation.zh: ‎你知道吗？海马先生有宝宝了！

translation.en: -This is shooing motion. -That's what I'm doing.
translation.zh:
‎-这才是叫他退后的手势
‎-跟我一样啊

translation.en: -No, that's waving. -Drinking sea water makes you go crazy.
translation.zh:
‎-不是 你在招手
‎-喝海水会疯掉

translation.en: But, really, what else am I supposed to drink?

translation.zh:
‎-你在招手
‎-不是 我在叫他退后

‎-分明就是招手
‎-我这是在叫他退后

translation.en: I know blubber is just what it's called, but that doesn't make it any less hurtful.
translation.zh:
‎我知道那叫“鲸脂”
‎但听起来也挺伤人的

translation.en: Oh, oh, save the Grand Flower Flummel!
Were you guys waving or shooing?
translation.zh: ‎你们刚才在招手 还是叫我退后？

translation.en: Oh, you two really did it this time.
I really hope Jepson didn't see that.
translation.zh: ‎希望杰普森没看到刚才那一幕

translation.en: You know, I'm patient. Oh, yes, I am.
translation.zh: ‎我是个有耐心的菲拉萌 绝对是

translation.en: But sometimes a leader has to lead.
translation.zh: ‎但有时候领袖就是要做好本分

translation.en: And that is why, Op and Ed,
you are forbidden from coming to the Flower Festival!
While we go up the mountain,
why don't you two take some time and think about what you did...
translation.zh:
‎不如你们俩用点时间
‎好好反省一下所犯下的错

translation.en: Oh, that's why it's called that.
[Ed] And there goes my last chance to belong.
translation.zh: ‎我失去了最后一个找到归宿感的机会

translation.en: I know this seems bad, but we can--
translation.zh: ‎我知道这看似件坏事 但我们大可…

translation.en: [Ed groans] How do you talk me into these things?
I finally understand why this is called
Look, we destroyed all the flowers, right?
So, we're gonna get more flowers no one's ever seen before.
translation.zh:
‎我们只要摘更多
‎大家没见过的花就行了

translation.en: They'll have no choice but to forgive us. Now, come on!
translation.zh: ‎到时他们只好原谅我们 走吧

translation.en: It's just a little bit further-- Whoa!
Op! Oh, no. I knew it!
translation.zh: ‎奥普 不要啊 我就知道会出事！
‎我好害怕啊 不前不后 孤苦伶仃

translation.en: Okay, well... [laughs] just making small talk. Looks like rain. No, it doesn't.
translation.zh:
‎我只是说些有的没的
‎就像一阵过云雨 不对

translation.en: Whoa, I've never even seen this flower before.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 我还是第一次见到这种花

translation.en: -I got this. [grunts] -That means I get to name it.
translation.zh:
‎-我行的
‎-这意味着我能给这种花取名

translation.en: -[Ed] No, I don't have this. -Opadils. No, that's stupid.
translation.zh:
‎-我还是不行
‎-叫奥普迪莉丝花 不行 太俗气
‎叫奥普拉妮姆丝花？叫木兰花？

translation.en: You know what? This may actually work.
For sure, this is totally gonna--
-I think I can reach it. -This is my life.
translation.zh:
‎-我快碰到了
‎-这就是我的“萌”生

translation.en: [Ed] Are you seeing what I'm seeing?
translation.zh: ‎你看到的跟我看到的一样吗？

translation.en: It is amazing! What do you think it is?
No idea. I've never seen anything like it.
translation.zh: ‎不知道 我没见过这种东西

translation.en: [Ed] You think it's some kind of new whale?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得是不是新品种的鲸鱼？

translation.en: [Op] Whale? What are you talking about?
-[Ed] What are you talking about? -What are you talking about?
translation.zh:
‎-那你指的又是什么？
‎-你到底指的是什么？

translation.en: Op, what are you talking about?
translation.zh: ‎奥普 你到底指的是什么？

translation.en: I'm talking about this gorgeous, glowing, swirling--
translation.zh:
‎我指的是这朵瑰丽
‎闪闪发亮、不停旋转的…

translation.en: Ed! Help! Pull me up. Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa,
translation.zh: ‎艾德 救我 赶紧把我拉上去 天啊

translation.en: -whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa... -Arms tired from poking crabs.
translation.zh:
‎-天啊
‎-手臂刚才戳螃蟹戳累了

translation.en: We went into a flower on Flummel Island, then we came out of a flower in this place.
translation.zh:
‎我们掉进了菲拉萌岛上的一朵花之中
‎从花里钻出来后 就来到这个地方

translation.en: No, but it's still pretty wild though.
translation.zh: ‎不知道 但这也太匪夷所思了

translation.en: Hmm, where are my mid-distance bifocals?
Wait a minute. Wait a minute. Wait a minute. Stop.
How did flower picking turn into...
Don't worry. I can fix this.

translation.zh: ‎是吗？那就马上处理好这个情景

translation.en: Op, that mountain you're on is moving.
translation.zh: ‎奥普 你所在的那座山在动啊

translation.en: Oh, hey. Isn't this place great?
We should have never left Desolation Rock.
translation.zh: ‎我们从一开始就不应该离开凄凉石

translation.en: Your ideas have caused us nothing but trouble.
translation.zh: ‎你的想法只会给我们带来麻烦

translation.en: So, we're doing things my way,
translation.zh: ‎所以这次必须按照我的方式行事

translation.en: You're the cutest things I've ever seen.
translation.zh: ‎你们是我见过最可爱的小家伙

translation.en: Do you wanna come home and marry my dolly?
translation.zh:
‎要不要跟我回家？
‎你可以迎娶我的娃娃

translation.en: And you can marry my cat.
Why do you get the cat? I want the cat.
translation.zh:
‎为什么是你跟猫在一起？
‎我想要跟猫在一起

translation.en: -[gasps] It's you again. -Whoa, whoa, whoa! You got it all wrong.
translation.zh:
‎-又是你
‎-等一下 你们误会了

translation.en: I'm here to help you guys. Sorry for being so rude back at the house.
translation.zh:
‎我是来帮你们的
‎抱歉 刚才在家失礼了

translation.en: We dogs are very territorial, you know.
translation.zh: ‎我们狗狗非常看重领地 你们懂的

translation.en: -No. We don't know. -We don't know anything.
translation.zh:
‎-不懂 我们不懂
‎-我们什么都不懂

translation.en: Well, let's start with the basics then. I'm Clarance and I'm a dog.
translation.zh:
‎那我们就从简单的自我介绍开始吧
‎我叫克拉伦斯 我是一只狗

translation.en: I'm Op and this is Ed and we are--
translation.zh: ‎我叫奥普 他叫艾德 我们都是…

translation.en: Uh, guys? Wait, wait, no, no. You don't understand. No.
translation.zh: ‎两位 等等 你们糊涂了

translation.en: -[door closes] -[gasps] He's gonna eat a flummel!
We won't let you die, brother.
Guys, guys, guys, it's just a donut.

translation.zh:
‎是一种食物
‎成分是精制糖和反式脂肪

translation.en: I have to admit, we're pretty delicious.
translation.zh: ‎不得不说 我们挺好吃的

translation.en: Yeah. I imagine you guys have a few questions.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得你们应该有很多疑问

translation.en: You should probably ask "when" are we.
No. We're gonna stick with where are we. Yeah. Where?
translation.zh:
‎-我们还是想知道这是什么地方
‎-对啊 这是哪里？
‎说真的 你们该问这是什么年代才对

‎-不要 这是哪里？
‎-我只想知道这是哪里

translation.en: Uh, this will take some visual aid.
Oh, I know just the place to get you some answers. Follow me.
translation.zh:
‎我知道哪里可以回答你们的问题了
‎跟我走一趟吧

translation.en: I don't know what these are, but I finally feel like we belong to something.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道这些是什么玩意
‎但我们好像终于找到归属感了

translation.en: Ugh, it makes my skin crawl.
[pants] What are we looking at here? We found us's.
And as usual, they're ignoring us.
translation.zh: ‎一如既往 他们都不理我们

translation.en: So, what's going on here? Guys, guys, relax.
translation.zh:
‎-这到底怎么回事？
‎-两位 别紧张

translation.en: This is the Hall of Extinct Creatures.
Okay. I mean, the Hall of Extinct Creatures.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 我想说的是
‎这是“绝种动物大厅”

translation.en: Well, you see it began with-- I guess I could--
translation.zh:
‎是这样的 某种生物绝种是因为…
‎我应该这么说…

translation.en: Oh, you know what, I'll just let this thing do it.
A ship cuts across the sea
That's the thing I saw before we fell into the flower.
translation.zh:
‎我们掉进花之前
‎我看到的就是这个东西

translation.en: We are the Beagle of His Majesty's royal fleet.
translation.zh: ‎我们是陛下皇家战舰的比格犬军队

translation.en: author of On the Origin of Species.
Right now, I'm studying the Galapagos
where I've just discovered a previously unknown island.
translation.zh: ‎我刚发现了一座不为人知的岛屿

translation.en: [man] Unfortunately, the island volcano erupted before they got there.
translation.zh:
‎不幸的是 他们尚未抵达那座岛屿
‎岛上的火山就爆发了

translation.en: was a single sliver of beach.
That's not even the best part of the beach.
translation.zh: ‎那还不是岛上最漂亮的海滩呢

translation.en: On the island, Darwin discovered the remains
translation.zh:
‎在岛上 ‎达尔文发现了
‎一种罕见环形动物的残骸

‎达尔文发现了
‎一种罕见环形动物的残骸

‎并将之取名为
‎“菲拉萌斯-海迪利亚”

translation.en: He theorized that the entire flummel species
translation.zh:
‎他的推理是 ‎整个菲拉萌物种
‎都在这场火山爆发中灭绝了

‎整个菲拉萌物种
‎都在这场火山爆发中灭绝了
‎菲拉萌斯-海迪利亚已经不复存在了
‎死了 消失了 完蛋了

translation.en: It doesn't make any sense. Everyone was just fine.
translation.zh:
‎怎么会这样？不可能的 ‎刚才大家都好好的
‎我们上一刻还在岛上呢

‎刚才大家都好好的
‎我们上一刻还在岛上呢
‎好吧 克拉伦斯 那我就问你

translation.en: So, we're in the future in a place called "Shanghai".
translation.zh:
‎我们穿越到了未来
‎来到了一个叫“上海”的地方

translation.en: And all of the other flummels are... gone?
No more that guy whose name we don't know.
translation.zh: ‎那些不知名的家伙都不在了

translation.en: Normally, I'd be excited that we just rhymed.
translation.zh:
‎通常说话句句都有押韵
‎我都会嗨起来

translation.en: Well, worry a little, but either way, stick with the dog.
translation.zh:
‎稍微担心也行
‎但无论如何 跟我待在一起就对了

translation.en: That's Sun, Dr. Chung's wife. Nice lady.
translation.zh:
‎她叫阿珊 是钟博士的太太
‎是个好脾气的妇人

translation.en: Really knows how to scratch a tummy.
and used them to travel through time
before he got lost somehow, somewhere.
translation.zh: ‎只是后来他迷失了方向 ‎不知所踪

translation.en: Anyway, the answer to all your problems is right through here. So, come on.
translation.zh:
‎你们所有问题的答案都在里面
‎我们马上出发吧

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. I'm not going through that thing again. What if we end up Dr. Chung-ed?
translation.zh:
‎我可不想再跑进那个玩意里
‎万一结果跟钟博士一样怎么办？
‎别担心 把问题交到我手上就对了

translation.en: Okay. Paws, but front paws, get it?
Thanks to me, Sun hasn't even noticed that Dr. Chung is missing.
translation.zh:
‎多亏了我 阿珊到现在还没意识到
‎钟博士已经失踪了

translation.en: Welcome to the time terminal... [voice echoes] terminal.
A place neither in the past nor the future.
translation.zh: ‎一个没有过去和未来的地方

translation.en: Dr. Chung discovered that each one of these portals
translation.zh: ‎钟博士发现上面每个传送门

translation.en: leads to a different time flower somewhere in history.
translation.zh:
‎能通往每朵时光花
‎在历史中所在的地点
‎就试试这个吧 1787年 奥地利

translation.en: And now he's just showing off.
All we have to do is find the seed that activates the Galapagos portal,
translation.zh:
‎只要我们能找到打开
‎科隆群岛传送门的种子

translation.en: and you'll be on your way home.
No, home before the volcanic explosion,
translation.zh:
‎不是 回到火山爆发前一刻
‎去警告大家

‎不是 回到火山爆发前一刻
‎去警告大家 ‎去警告他们？

translation.en: How are the flummels gonna trust us with their lives
translation.zh: ‎菲拉萌怎么可能把性命托付给我们？

translation.en: when they don't even trust us with their flowers?
translation.zh: ‎他们连我们摘来的花也信不过

translation.en: Remember when I told you "look to the future"?
translation.zh: ‎我跟你说过要“展望未来” 记得吗？

translation.en: This is that future because we're the only ones
translation.zh:
‎这就是“未来” ‎因为我们是唯一能够拯救整个物种
‎免于灭亡命运的菲拉萌

translation.en: who can save the flummels from extinction.
translation.zh:
‎因为我们是唯一能够拯救整个物种
‎免于灭亡命运的菲拉萌

translation.en: We're gonna stand out... as heroes.
translation.zh: ‎我们必须站出来 成为救世英雄

translation.en: But if we're gonna do this, we have to do it right.
translation.zh: ‎真要这么做 就得好好做

translation.en: -Not this one or this one. Not this one. -[worried grunting]
No, actually, I'm doing it all right.
-[electrical hissing] -I found it! I found the seed for it.
translation.zh: ‎我知道了 我找到了科隆群岛的种子

translation.en: Maybe we're supposed to be extinct.
This is horrible. I got to get out of here. Oh.
translation.zh: ‎好可怕 我要想办法离开这个地方

translation.en: I'm Ernest Shackleton, head of the Ernest Shackleton Expedition.
translation.zh:
‎我是欧内斯特沙克尔顿
‎欧内斯特沙克尔顿探险队队长

translation.en: Now, don't worry, you're with friends,
part of a team, team Ernest Shackleton.
translation.zh:
‎你是队友
‎欧内斯特沙克尔顿探险队一员

translation.en: Hello. I'm Clarance. And you are?
translation.zh:
‎你们好 我叫克拉伦斯
‎请问贵姓大名？

translation.en: [all] We are all here to serve Master.
translation.zh: ‎我们的存在就是为了服务主人

translation.en: What are you two? Monsters? Space aliens?
translation.zh:
‎你们俩什么东西？是怪物吗？
‎还是外星人？

translation.en: We're none of those things. We're Op and Ed, we're--
translation.zh: ‎都不是 我叫奥普 他叫艾德 我们是…

translation.en: They appear to be a pair of flummels, Flummelios Hidella, to be exact.
translation.zh:
‎他们看似一对菲拉萌
‎准确点 是叫“菲拉萌斯-海迪利亚”

translation.en: The Germans refer to them as... [speaking German]
They all went extinct in the early 19th century.
translation.zh: ‎菲拉萌在十九世纪初期全部灭绝了

translation.en: My anxious friend here is Burnie, and he's a Tasmanian tiger,
translation.zh:
‎这位容易焦虑的同伴叫伯尼
‎是一只袋狼

translation.en: and Alma is a meridian gelada.
They're new and small and new.
translation.zh: ‎是新来的 又小又没见过

translation.en: And this is Hoss. He's from the Cretaceous Period.
So, he's millions of years old, but also he's only five.
translation.zh:
‎他已经有好几千万年历史了
‎但实际年龄只有五岁

translation.en: We are, mate. We'd be happy to tell you all about everything.
translation.zh:
‎-我们都是绝种动物
‎-我们很乐意向你们解说一切

translation.en: We have a nice glossy brochure or...
translation.zh: ‎要么参考我们闪亮的讲解手册

translation.en: So you're wondering what it means To be an extinctable
Well, I'm afraid the answer Starts with the unthinkable
translation.zh: ‎恐怕答案会令大家感到匪夷所思
‎很多年前 我们差点死了

translation.en: But lucky for us Dr. Chung arrived
He brought us here Where it's safe and warm
translation.zh:
‎他把我们带来这里
‎给我们庇护和温暖

translation.en: And sheltered us from major storm
translation.zh: ‎保护我们免受致命天灾伤害

‎-她是指保护他们免受灭绝的命运
‎-可能吧

translation.en: Now we call this strange place home
translation.zh:
‎如今这个奇怪的地方
‎被我们称为“家”

translation.en: And honestly prefer not to roam
translation.zh: ‎说真的 我们宁可哪里也不去

translation.en: We know staying here Feels like a crime
translation.zh: ‎我们知道待在这里跟坐牢没两样

translation.en: When we could explore anyplace in time Like 4 BC or NYC
translation.zh:
‎我们大可去探索任何时空和地点
‎例如公元前4世纪 或是纽约市
‎东京、希腊 或是比利牛斯山

translation.en: Maybe visit Pompeii Before it went to rubble
translation.zh: ‎也许可以去探索被夷为平地前的庞贝

translation.en: Nope This place is not worth the trouble
translation.zh: ‎才不要 这些地方太麻烦了

translation.en: But the world's full of danger And life is unfair
translation.zh: ‎这个世界充满危险 不如意事常八九

translation.en: So you can kill time here Or time will kill you out there
translation.zh:
‎要不待在这里懒洋洋度日
‎要不到外面的世界任时间吞噬

translation.en: There's plague and famine Germs by the pound
translation.zh: ‎瘟疫、饥荒和病菌 步步逼近

translation.en: Virus and disease No cure to be found
There's wars and swords And tyrants abound
translation.zh: ‎战争不断 刀光剑影 巨人处处

translation.en: Aliens, Bigfoot The Earth isn't round
translation.zh: ‎还有外星人、大脚怪 地球不是圆的

translation.en: Get crushed, blown up Or fall deathly ill
translation.zh: ‎要不被碾死 要不被炸死 要不病死

translation.en: For the world's full of danger And life is unfair
translation.zh: ‎这个世界充满危险 不如意事常八九

translation.en: So you can kill time here Or time will kill you out there
translation.zh:
‎要不待在这里懒洋洋度日
‎要不到外面的世界任时间吞噬

translation.en: The bulldog rat, the Aztec cat
Giant goose and the great stag moose
The large sloth lemur The Pleistocene beaver
The Russian retriever Guys, I wish you could've seen it
translation.zh:
‎俄罗斯黄金猎犬
‎各位 真希望你们见过它

translation.en: 'Cause no matter the name They're all out of the game
translation.zh:
‎无论它们什么名号
‎如今已经消失殆尽

translation.en: It's a Japanese sea lion crying shame
translation.zh: ‎日本海狮的灭绝简直令人惋惜

translation.en: It could happen any year In any hemisphere
translation.zh:
‎无论南北半球
‎这种事年年都有可能上演

translation.en: If you wanna stay safe Best stay right here
translation.zh: ‎想要安然无恙 最好还是待在这里

translation.en: For the world's full of danger
You can kill time here or
Time can kill you out there
translation.zh: ‎要不到外面的世界任时间吞噬

translation.en: You know, I feel Clarance would've really gotten a kick out of that.
translation.zh: ‎如果克拉伦斯看到 肯定会嗨爆的
‎等等 是那个“克拉伦斯”吗？

translation.en: Uh, the portals just went crazy
and... and then Clarance flew away...
This is a new record, Op.
We've been here all of ten minutes, and everybody already hates us.
translation.zh:
‎我们待在这里不超过十分钟
‎大家就已经讨厌我们了

translation.en: It's fine. It'll all be fine.
translation.zh: ‎没事的 一切都会好起来的

translation.en: Ed and I will get Clarance and the seed back.
translation.zh:
‎我和艾德
‎一定会把克拉伦斯和种子找回来

translation.en: I hate to break it to you, but there's no telling where or when Clarance might be.
translation.zh:
‎恕我直言 我们不可能知道
‎克拉伦斯目前在时空里的哪个地方

translation.en: Not to mention, he may be taken by body snatchers,
translation.zh: ‎更何况他可能已经被盗尸犯

translation.en: Burnie. The point is, Clarance could be anywhere, literally.
translation.zh: ‎伯尼 重点是要找到克拉伦斯不容易

translation.en: Doesn't he have to be in one of those places?
to these dozens of unknown and dangerous places
translation.zh: ‎前往这些不知名的危险地点

translation.en: in hopes of stumbling across Clarance by sheer dumb luck?
translation.zh:
‎只期望无意间走狗屎运
‎碰到克拉伦斯？

translation.en: Sounds like a plan to me.

translation.zh:
‎-赶紧去把那只狗找回来吧
‎-慢着

translation.en: Did she say "dangerous"? Did you say "dangerous"?
translation.zh:
‎她不是说很危险吗？
‎你不是说很危险吗？
‎“危险”只是“勇气”的另一个说法

translation.en: Hello, sir. Have you seen a cute little doggy around here?
translation.zh:
‎先生 你好
‎你有没有看到一只可爱的小狗狗？
‎毛茸茸 个子大概这么高

translation.en: No sign of Clarance, and we almost got killed.
translation.zh: ‎找不到克拉伦斯 我们差点被杀了

translation.en: This is why I don't like to travel.
translation.zh: ‎这就是我不喜欢旅行的原因

translation.en: Come on, Ed. We've got a lot more places to check,
translation.zh: ‎艾德 走吧 我们还有很多地方要去呢

translation.en: Hi, me. Oh, no. There's a hole right through me.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 奥普 我中间有个洞

translation.en: [laughs] Just messing. I know that's how I look. Wow, your sister really is...
translation.zh:
‎-开玩笑的 我知道自己长什么样子
‎-天啊 你姐姐真是那个…

translation.en: Bound to be the eventual death of me?
translation.zh: ‎最后会害死我的克星 对吧？

translation.en: Okay, Ed. I've got a great feeling about this next portal.
translation.zh:
‎艾德 我有强烈的预感
‎下一个传送门就能找到他了

translation.en: [laughs] That lady really didn't like us trying on her hat.
translation.zh:
‎那个女人很不愿意
‎让我们试戴她的帽子

‎-是吗？
‎-天啊 是埃及艳后的皇冠

translation.en: History must be a non-stop adventure.
translation.zh: ‎历史肯定是个停不下来的冒险

translation.en: Each place is more exciting than the last.
translation.zh: ‎每个地方都比上一个更精彩

translation.en: you do not want to leave here where it's safe.
translation.zh: ‎你不会想要离开这个安全之地的

translation.en: And Op, he's just a kid.
translation.zh: ‎至于奥普嘛 他只是个孩子

translation.en: You should stop putting ideas in his head.
translation.zh: ‎别再往他脑袋里塞新的想法了

translation.en: But I want ideas in my head.
translation.zh: ‎但我希望能给脑袋注入新的想法

translation.en: I'm so cooped up in here.
I know what will knock the glum right outta ya.
translation.zh: ‎我知道做什么能让你抖擞精神

translation.en: Live from inside Dr. Chung's mobile greenhouse,

translation.zh: ‎有请伯尼 绰号“澳洲奇迹”

translation.en: First, I'll need a common household item.
translation.zh: ‎首先 我需要一个家常用品

translation.en: Now, I place the object between the two Time Flowers
translation.zh: ‎我会把这个物件放在两朵时光花之间
‎速速、快变、考拉熊、澳大利亚野犬

translation.en: Where'd it go? Where'd it go?
It'll be back in three, two, one, and...
A magician never reveals his secrets.
translation.zh: ‎魔术师永远不能揭露自己的秘密

translation.en: The merging of two Time Flowers
causes an extremely powerful arc that disassembles the atoms of an item,
translation.zh:
‎就会激发出一股极其强大的能量弧线
‎足以粉碎物件分子

translation.en: sends them into a time loop, then reassembles the item at a different point in time.
translation.zh:
‎然后送往一个时间回圈
‎并在不同的时间点重新组合分子

translation.en: All we do, we do for Master.
translation.zh: ‎我们的一举一动都是为了主人

translation.en: Well, uh, I think I heard Master say
you two should snap my leash so I can go free.
translation.zh: ‎你们俩要弄断我的锁链 放我自由
‎打住 主人叫你们停下来

translation.en: [sighs] This did not go how I hoped.
But I do see a pretty good wall.
translation.zh: ‎但我看到了一面挺好看的长城

translation.en: On second thought, a great wall.
translation.zh: ‎仔细想想 应该叫“万里长城”

translation.en: Imagine if we brought these back to the flummels. [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎如果能把这些花
‎带去给其他菲拉萌看 那该多好

translation.en: We have a lot of mess ahead of us, and you keep making the mess messier.
translation.zh:
‎我们前面还有很多麻烦要解决
‎你只会把这些麻烦越弄越大

translation.en: You just don't think things through.
I mean, we've been lucky so far,
translation.zh: ‎这一路走来 是我们运气好

translation.en: but one of these days, you're gonna get someone hurt,
translation.zh: ‎但这样下去 迟早会有人受伤的

translation.en: From now on, we don't do anything unless we're both onboard.
translation.zh:
‎从现在起 除非获得我们俩一致同意
‎否则我们鲁莽行事
‎我们终于有机会放松一下了

translation.en: It's been a while. You do think they're okay out there?
translation.zh:
‎他们离开好一阵子了
‎不会出事了吧？

translation.en: Barely. Those sky flowers tried to kill us.
translation.zh:
‎差点就没命了
‎我们差点被天空之花炸死

translation.en: These are fireworks. The Chinese invented them.
translation.zh: ‎你是指烟火吧 是中国人发明的

translation.en: They also invented the gunpowder inside them.
translation.zh: ‎他们还发明了烟火中的火药

translation.en: They came from the Qianlong Coronation.
translation.zh: ‎这些烟火是从乾隆加冕仪式上弄来的

translation.en: So... where you two going next?
translation.zh: ‎那你们下一个地点是去哪里呢？

translation.en: If that's the one you want, then I love it.
translation.zh: ‎既然你挑中了这个 那我就没意见

translation.en: Let's hope it's the right one, for the flummels' sake.
translation.zh:
‎希望这个是对的
‎菲拉萌的生死就掌握在我们手上

translation.en: They have no idea our entire species is doomed.
translation.zh: ‎他们不知道整个物种就要完蛋了

translation.en: I can't believe you guys found me.
You're better explorers than this Shackleton guy.
translation.zh:
‎你们的探险能力
‎比这个叫沙克尔顿还要强

translation.en: Oh, you'll be happy to know I kept this safe.
translation.zh:
‎有件事你们听了一定会高兴
‎我一直都把种子保管好

translation.en: [gasps] I have a plan. Op has a plan.
translation.zh:
‎-我想到了一个办法
‎-奥普想到了一个办法

translation.en: -Good. What's the plan? -Yeah. What's the plan?
translation.zh:
‎-很好 什么办法？
‎-对啊 什么办法？

translation.en: No, no, no. She wouldn't abandon us. We just talked about this.
translation.zh:
‎不会的 她是不会抛下我们的
‎我们刚说好的

translation.en: And Op just promised me that she wouldn't do this kind of thing anymore.
translation.zh:
‎奥普刚答应过我
‎她不会再鲁莽行事了

translation.en: She'll be back. She's probably just gonna just--
translation.zh: ‎她一定会回来的 她可能只是…

translation.en: Okay. She might have abandoned us.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 她可能已经抛下我们了

translation.en: Op runs off, and I'm left pounding a rock.
translation.zh: ‎奥普逃跑了 把我留在这边砸石头

translation.en: Hoss, see that shiny necklace on Clarance?
translation.zh:
‎霍斯 看到克拉伦斯脖子上
‎亮晶晶的锁链吗？

translation.en: We can't get home without that seed. Hoss, circle back around.
translation.zh:
‎没有种子就回不去了
‎霍斯 赶紧调转回头

translation.en: Back into the Time Flower, Hoss, and step on it.
translation.zh:
‎霍斯 回到时光花那边
‎然后一脚踩进去

translation.en: Do you know how to play this game?
Hey, have you guys seen Hoss?
translation.zh: ‎对了 你们有没有看见霍斯？

translation.en: -[piano keys clang off-key] -[Mozart] Was ist das?
You almost got him extinct. Not to mention the rest of us.
translation.zh: ‎你害他和大伙儿差点灭绝了

translation.en: That's right, you didn't think, and you didn't listen.
translation.zh: ‎没错 你没想过 也不听别人怎么说

translation.en: Even though you looked me in the eye
and promised me that you wouldn't do anything unless we were both onboard.
translation.zh:
‎答应我说除非获得我们俩一致同意
‎否则不会鲁莽行事

translation.en: All this time I thought I never fit in with the flummels
translation.zh:
‎这些年来 我一直以为
‎一定是我有问题

translation.en: because there was something wrong with me.
I'm saying that my life would be better off without you!
translation.zh: ‎我想说的是 没有你 我会过得更顺遂

translation.en: I'm sure he just needs some time to cool off.
And he is better off without me.
translation.zh: ‎没有我 他会过得更顺遂

translation.en: But there's one thing I can still do.
-I'm going back to warn the flummels. -Oh, whoa, whoa, whoa.
translation.zh:
‎我要回去警告其他菲拉萌 ‎等一下
‎你应该跟艾德一起去才对吧？

translation.en: I'm not sure you should go without Ed.
translation.zh:
‎等一下
‎你应该跟艾德一起去才对吧？

translation.en: I'd just end up causing him more trouble,
and I've caused him enough trouble already.
If I can pull this off, then Ed will have a community to go home to.
translation.zh:
‎如果我把这件事办好
‎艾德就能回到原来的群体之中

translation.en: at least I can't hurt him again.
translation.zh: ‎起码他再也不会受到我的伤害

translation.en: [Mali] You know, you're also a great leader on the dance floor.
translation.zh: ‎没想到你在舞池上也是个出色的领导

translation.en: You've said that about five times already.
little reminder, this is the Flower Festival.
translation.zh: ‎提醒你一下 这是百花节庆典现场

translation.en: Second reminder, you've been banned from the Flower Festival.
translation.zh:
‎再次提醒你一下
‎你已经被禁止参加百花节了

translation.en: I don't have time for the whole story, but I need everyone's attention.
translation.zh:
‎我没时间解释整个来龙去脉了
‎请大家听我说话

translation.en: I am trying to get my kids to sleep in here.
-[baby crying] -Oh, now, I'm up all night.
translation.zh: ‎糟糕 看来我整晚都没得睡了

translation.en: I just returned from the future. and I learned that in the past,
translation.zh:
‎我刚从未来回来
‎因此得知过去发生了什么事

translation.en: and by the past I mean now,
our entire species is about to stop existing.
translation.zh: ‎我们整个物种就快不复存在了

translation.en: So, if we're going to live to see the future,
translation.zh: ‎如果我们想要活着看到未来

translation.en: we have to do something now,
We're all about to go extinct.

translation.zh: ‎各位 我保证不会有事的

translation.en: That's why I made this face because you're ridiculous.
translation.zh:
‎因为你太离谱了
‎所以我才做出这种表情

translation.en: Oh, no. Don't drag me into this.
Look, here's proof I was in the future.
translation.zh: ‎看好 这就是我去过未来的证据

translation.en: -Why did I think this would work? -[screams]
translation.zh:
‎我当初怎么会觉得
‎这个方法行得通呢？

translation.en: Wow, you really let her have it.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 你刚才还真对她动怒了

translation.en: Remind me to never get on your bad side.
translation.zh: ‎这也提醒了我以后最好不要惹恼你

translation.en: But don't you think you were maybe a little bit hard on her?
translation.zh:
‎难道你不觉得
‎你刚才对她说的话太重了吗？

translation.en: She is your sister after all.
No. It's been like this our whole lives.
Maybe I shouldn't have said it out loud,
translation.zh: ‎也许我的语气不应该那么重

translation.en: My life would be much better without her.
translation.zh: ‎没有她 我会过得更顺遂

translation.en: This is a place of withouts.
We all live here without our families, without friends.
translation.zh: ‎我们住在这里 没有家人 也没有同伴

translation.en: Sometimes, I think, without really living at all.
translation.zh: ‎有时候 我觉得我们并没有真正活着

translation.en: But I can tell you this,
life is really tough when you're all by yourself.
translation.zh:
‎如果一生只有自己一个人
‎那会过得非常辛苦

translation.en: ...messing. I know that's how I look. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎开玩笑的 我知道自己长什么样子

translation.en: Hey, Ed. Ed, are you seeing this?
Could someone give me a hand with this?
Hey, check it out, I'm the friend at the end.
Hey, Wally, get over here, buddy.
translation.zh: ‎沃利 老朋友 过来这边

translation.en: I have to talk to Op.
Hey, Ed, check this out? You wanna sign my cast?
translation.zh:
‎艾德 瞧瞧我这个石膏
‎要在我的石膏上签名吗?

translation.en: I wanted to ask Op if she'd sign it, too,
but she left in kind of a hurry.
I think she said something about going home.
Gave us a lot to think about.
But let's be honest, truthful, real truthful,
translation.zh: ‎我们就开诚布公、坦怀相待吧

translation.en: you never went to the future.

translation.zh: ‎你错了 她确实去过未来

translation.en: And I can attest to it.
I don't know, but sick do.

translation.zh:
‎我是一只狗
‎有一半贵宾犬血统 一半…

‎我是一只狗
‎有一半贵宾犬血统 一半… ‎我也说不上来 我妈交际甚广
‎我也说不上来 我妈交际甚广

translation.en: [gasps] You came! You've gotta tell the flummels they're in trouble.
translation.zh:
‎好在你来了
‎赶紧告诉这些菲拉萌说他们有危险

translation.en: Oh, they most certainly are in trouble...
Hey, wait! Where are you going?
Okay. So, she might have been telling the truth.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 她说的可能都是实话

translation.en: And why did you do this?
Hate, hate, hate, hate, hate hate, hate! Flummels ruined my life!
translation.zh: ‎讨厌死了！ ‎菲拉萌毁了我的一生

translation.en: I was a puppy once, adorable and spunky,
translation.zh: ‎我以前是个活力满满的小萌狗

translation.en: just waiting for a family to take me home.
But unfortunately, I lived in a world of flummels.
translation.zh:
‎不行的是
‎我活在一个充满菲拉萌的世界里

translation.en: And flummels were the most popular pet in the world.
translation.zh: ‎而菲拉萌是全世界最受欢迎的宠物
‎人人都想要一个难看的小圈圈

translation.en: I get it. Nobody wanted a dog with a stomach.
translation.zh: ‎我懂 没人想要一个有小肚肚的狗狗

translation.en: But then, one day, my luck changed.
translation.zh: ‎有一天 我的命运改变了

translation.en: [Dr. Chung] He's perfect. I'll take him.
translation.zh: ‎它是最好的选择 我要把他带回家

translation.en: [Clarance] I couldn't believe it. This man wanted me.
translation.zh: ‎真不可思议 这个人竟然要带我回家

translation.en: And he even loved me enough to give me a name.
translation.zh: ‎他很爱我 甚至给我取了一个名字

translation.en: You're coming home with me, Clarance.
translation.zh: ‎克拉伦斯 跟我一起回家吧

translation.en: [Clarance] I was expecting a warm bed, and a fresh pile of newspapers.
translation.zh:
‎我以为他会给我一张温暖的床
‎以及一叠新报纸
‎坐下 ‎但没想到他给我更好的东西

translation.en: -I got something better. -[Dr. Chung] Good boy.
translation.zh: ‎但没想到他给我更好的东西 ‎乖狗狗

translation.en: [Clarance] It was then that I realized I was more than just a pet.
translation.zh: ‎当时我才意识到自己不只是一只宠物

translation.en: I was a part of science.
[man] It's the top of the fifth inning as the Bambino steps to the plate.
translation.zh: ‎来到第五回合 贝比鲁斯就位

translation.en: He's pointing to a dog on a tiny little car.
translation.zh: ‎他指着一只坐在一辆小车上的狗狗

translation.en: Oh, Doctor, I don't believe it.
I finally felt I belonged somewhere,
adventuring through time and history together.
translation.zh: ‎一起冒险 一起穿越时空和历史

translation.en: [Clarance] But then, one day, we traveled to 1835,
translation.zh: ‎后来有一天 我们穿越到1835年

translation.en: And there we found a bunch of these stupid napkin rings.
translation.zh: ‎我们在岛上发现了一堆难看的餐巾环

translation.en: [Clarance] Dr. Chung told me this was when Darwin first discovered flummels
translation.zh:
‎钟博士跟我说
‎这里就是达尔文第一次发现菲拉萌

translation.en: and introduced them to the rest of the world.
translation.zh: ‎并让全世界认识这种生物的地方

translation.en: [Dr. Chung] Oh, my goodness, look at you.

translation.zh: ‎克拉伦斯 是不是很可爱呢？

translation.en: He was gonna love flummels more than me.
translation.zh: ‎他对菲拉萌的喜爱以后会比我还要多

translation.en: And then it hit me. I didn't have to accept the course of history.
translation.zh:
‎于是我有了一个领悟
‎我没必要无奈地接受历史的演化结果

translation.en: Ready for our next adventure, Clarance?
translation.zh:
‎克拉伦斯
‎准备好展开下一场冒险了吗？

translation.en: [Clarance] Yeah, that's right. I turned on my master.
translation.zh: ‎没错 我背叛了我的主人

translation.en: I pushed him though a portal and made sure he could never come back.
translation.zh:
‎我把他推进其中一个传送门
‎确保他永远回不了

translation.en: After that, there was nothing stopping me from coming back here
translation.zh:
‎在那之后
‎再也没有人阻止我回来这里
‎你们灭绝不是因为火山爆发

translation.en: Now, back to some smooth jazz.
translation.zh: ‎马上回来听些柔和的爵士乐

translation.en: [Clarance] It was a quick trip, but I got a lot done that day.
translation.zh:
‎那是一趟简短的旅程
‎但我那天完成了好多事

translation.en: And it was all a done deal until you two hula-hoops showed up.
translation.zh:
‎本来事情圆满解决了
‎直到你们两个呼啦圈出现

translation.en: But it's all about to be fixed,
because your brother is back with the other cowards
translation.zh: ‎因为你弟和那几个胆小鬼就快到了

translation.en: who never leave their precious, little Time Terminal.
translation.zh:
‎那几个家伙永远离不开
‎他们心爱的小小时光航站

translation.en: And you're not getting off this island alive.
That's more time than I thought. I mean it's not a lot of time but--
translation.zh:
‎时间比我想象的还要充分
‎虽然不多 但是…

translation.en: Yeah. I meant to only set it for three.

translation.zh: ‎要怪就怪这些没用的狗爪子

translation.en: You know what, it don't matter.
You've got a front row seat to your species' and your own extinction.
translation.zh:
‎你挑了个好位子
‎看着你的物种和你自己走向灭绝

translation.en: She's too funny to stay mad at.
translation.zh: ‎她太搞笑了 很难跟她赌气

translation.en: I just returned with the last Tasmanian tiger on Earth.
translation.zh: ‎我刚把地球上最后一只袋狼带了回来

translation.en: It scratched me up pretty good.
What? I don't get into cars with strangers.
translation.zh:
‎怎么？ ‎我又不是
‎那种随便跟陌生人上车的动物

translation.en: [gasps] That's the day he went missing.
Today, I'm visiting one of my heroes,
translation.zh: ‎今天我要去拜访我们的大英雄

translation.en: He created one of the first nautical maps ever.
Who knows? Maybe I'll even get to see him drawing it up.
translation.zh:
‎谁知道呢？
‎搞不好我能亲眼看他画航海图呢

translation.en: -1417, he said 1417. -[Dr. Chung] Okay. We know where he went now.
translation.zh:
‎他刚才提到1417年
‎我们知道他去哪里了

translation.en: [Dr. Chung] Ready for your next adventure, Clarance?
translation.zh:
‎克拉伦斯
‎准备好展开下一场冒险了吗？

translation.en: What kind of conspiracy nut am I if I didn't see that coming?
translation.zh: ‎我这个阴谋论者怎么没想到呢？

translation.en: But we could still save Dr. Chung if we just use whatever seeds...
translation.zh:
‎如果激活那颗种子
‎我们还是能把钟博士救回来

translation.en: Oh, I can't believe we finally know where Dr. Chung is,
translation.zh:
‎真是难以置信
‎我们终于知道钟博士去了哪里

translation.en: and there's no way to bring him back.
No, no. Dr. Chung said he was going to 1417, remember?
translation.zh:
‎行不通
‎钟博士说他去了1417年 不是吗？

translation.en: which means he probably joined his expedition to Malacca, 1418,
translation.zh:
‎这也意味着他可能在1418年
‎随着郑和前往马六甲了

translation.en: We just need some sort of beacon to lead him to it.
translation.zh: ‎只缺某种用来指引他的信标
‎没错 但拿什么当信标呢？

translation.en: We should also give him the brochure.
translation.zh: ‎顺便也把讲解手册交给他吧

translation.en: I'm so sorry, I didn't mean...
A volcano didn't make us extinct.
translation.zh: ‎我们灭绝不是因为火山爆发
‎那颗炸弹是克拉伦斯装上的

translation.en: and now he's trapped the others in the cave,
translation.zh: ‎他已经把其他菲拉萌困在山洞里

translation.en: and he trapped me against this tree and...
because we both didn't agree that it is.
I was so wrong to say what I said,
translation.zh: ‎我之前说那番话 实在是我不对

translation.en: and I want you to know that I didn't mean it.
translation.zh: ‎我想告诉你 我不是有意的

translation.en: All you've ever done is support me,
and my life would be nothing without you.
translation.zh: ‎我这一生少了你 就什么也不是

translation.en: What are you talking about? I can't do anything right.
translation.zh: ‎你说什么呢？我每件事都办不到

translation.en: You know it. I know it, the rest of the flummels certainly know it and--
translation.zh: ‎你懂 我懂 其他菲拉萌肯定也懂

translation.en: Who cares what the flummels think?
worried about fitting in with all the other flummels
translation.zh: ‎担心自己无法融入其他菲拉萌

translation.en: that I never even noticed this is where I fit in best.
Come on, I screw up all the time.
translation.zh: ‎得了吧 我经常把事情搞砸

translation.en: But if it weren't for your screw-ups,
then we would've never even fallen through that flower.
translation.zh: ‎那我们就不会掉进那朵花里

translation.en: we have a chance to rescue our species from extinction.
translation.zh:
‎我们有了拯救
‎我们物种免于灭绝的机会

translation.en: because they'd do the same thing for us if it were the other way around.
translation.zh:
‎因为换成我们出事了
‎他们也会拯救我们

translation.en: [sighs] You think you can get me out of this thing?
No problem. There's only a million combinations here.
translation.zh: ‎没问题 不过只有一百万个密码组合

translation.en: Next time I poke you, it's gonna be a lot softer.
translation.zh: ‎下次我戳你时 动作会轻点

translation.en: Come on, Op, we're not gonna let that adorable maniac get away with this.
translation.zh:
‎来吧 奥普
‎我们绝对不能放过那个疯魔的小可爱

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no. It can't be.
-Why won't these flummels just die? -[glass shatters]
Looks like I may need some help.
How much time before the bomb goes off?
I know it wants to kill us
translation.zh: ‎我知道这颗炸弹要干掉我们

translation.en: but you have to admit, it is helpful.
translation.zh: ‎但不得不承认 它还挺听话的

translation.en: Don't worry. You'll be long gone by then.
translation.zh: ‎放心吧 到时你们早就不在了

translation.en: What are you gonna do, fuzzball?
There's only one you and two us's.
And in case you were wondering if ancient Greek monsters are real,
translation.zh: ‎好奇古希腊的怪兽是不是真的存在

translation.en: Okay, Greg, you know what to do.
translation.zh: ‎格雷 你知道该怎么做了
‎绝种动物小组 准备行动

translation.en: I just drove for the first time and so far, I've only hit one pedestrian.
translation.zh:
‎这是我第一次开车
‎至今只撞倒了一个路人

translation.en: The best decision I've made in a long time.
translation.zh: ‎这是我长久以来做过最正确的决定
‎赶紧甩掉他 被他缠住了

translation.en: Crikey, that one eye makes for pretty poor depth perception.
translation.zh:
‎天啊 他只有一只眼睛
‎无法正确衡量景深

translation.en: He couldn't hit the broadside of a Hoss.
translation.zh: ‎连霍斯这种大块头也打不着边

‎-无意冒犯 霍斯
‎-不要紧的

translation.en: Hey, Cyclops, bet you can't hit me. -Bet you can't hit me. -Hmm?
Need a target? Hundred points if you get it through the bull's-eye.
translation.zh:
‎要找个目标 是吗？
‎击中靶心 我就给你满分

translation.en: -Hey, put some sauce on that meatball. -[all taunting]
translation.zh: ‎给肉丸加点酱汁 ‎来吧 蠢货 放马过来 老兄！
‎来吧 蠢货 放马过来 老兄！
‎我在跟你说话呢 独眼巨人

translation.en: He is a very, very, very ugly wet-looking dog.
translation.zh: ‎他一只非常难看和邋遢的狗狗

translation.en: So, I spent a lot of my cave time thinking about you two,
and what I would do if we ever got out of there alive.
translation.zh:
‎也想到如果我们能活着出来
‎我会做些什么

translation.en: You think maybe we could do this later?
translation.zh: ‎抱抱这种事迟点再做 好吗？

translation.en: The whole island is about to blow up.
The only thing we can do.
and then we do whatever they say.
translation.zh: ‎他们说什么 我们就跟着做

translation.en: The ship, that's Charles Darwin, the man from the museum movie.
translation.zh:
‎那艘船上的人是查尔斯达尔文
‎我们在博物馆视频中看到的人

translation.en: [gasps] If we make it to the beach, he might be able to save us.
translation.zh:
‎如果我们跑到海滩上
‎他或许救得了我们

translation.en: Wait, I know what that means, and it's good.
translation.zh: ‎等等 我懂什么意思 这是好事
‎杰普森 介绍一下 他们是绝种动物

translation.en: Is something wrong with them? They don't have any holes.
translation.zh:
‎他们有什么不对劲吗？
‎怎么身上没有洞？

translation.en: Jepson, you get everyone to the beach.
translation.zh: ‎杰普森 你把大伙儿都带到海滩上

translation.en: We'll meet you there after we get Darwin's attention with the sky flowers.
translation.zh:
‎我们会用天空之花引起达尔文的注意
‎待会儿海滩见

translation.en: Uh, but these flummels haven't been sanitized.
Wait. I just wanna say thanks for everything,
translation.zh:
‎我只想跟你说
‎感谢你为我们所做的一切

translation.en: and try not to fall to your death.
What do you think I am, a dodo?
Oh, because they look like flowers in the sky.
translation.zh:
‎我懂了
‎因为它们看起来像开在天上的花

translation.en: Hey, tell whoever came up with that name, great job.
translation.zh:
‎谁想出“天空之花”这个名号
‎我要给对方一个赞

translation.en: Can we go? Please, please, please, please, please?
[sighs] Fine. But this is the last island.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 但不能再去其他的岛了

translation.en: He sees us! Op and Ed did it!
translation.zh: ‎他看见我们了 奥普和艾德做到了

translation.en: Whoa, that felt weird to say.
Ah, now, that's the Op and Ed I know.
translation.zh: ‎这才是我所认识的奥普和艾德嘛

translation.en: Yeah, who'd have thought our aim would be too good?
translation.zh: ‎谁料到我们会瞄得这么准呢？

translation.en: You don't wanna eat us. Just eat me. Let Ed live.
translation.zh:
‎你不会想吃掉我们的
‎吃我就好了 放过艾德吧

translation.en: -Hmm? -[Ed] That's nice what you said out there, you know, outside of the mouth.
translation.zh: ‎你刚才在嘴巴外面说的那番话很感人

translation.en: I hope he swallows me first just so you can live a little longer.
translation.zh:
‎我希望他先把我吞下
‎这样你就能活久一点

translation.en: [Ed] I hope he swallows me first.
I don't wanna see you swallowed.
We're alive and smell like Cyclops's breath.
translation.zh:
‎我们没死
‎而且全身充满独眼巨人的口臭味

translation.en: Behind that big eye is an even bigger heart.
translation.zh:
‎这只大眼睛底下
‎是一颗宽容大量的心

translation.en: And by the way, you have a cavity.
Op, I don't think that ship is gonna get here in time to save us.
translation.zh:
‎奥普 我觉得那艘船
‎来不及开过来救走我们了

translation.en: [Ed] So the Cyclops will throw us to the Time Flower, we'll take it to the beach,
translation.zh:
‎独眼巨人会把我们俩抛到时光花那边
‎我们则会把花带到海滩上

translation.en: and we'll take everyone through it before the bomb goes off.
translation.zh: ‎让大伙儿在炸弹引爆前跳进去

translation.en: Hey, you can do it, big guy. We believe in you.
translation.zh: ‎大块头 你行的 我们相信你

translation.en: Nice aim, Greg. You're a natural.
translation.zh: ‎格雷 抛得好 你好有天分

translation.en: If I didn't know any better,
I'd say these creatures are trying to communicate with us.
translation.zh:
‎我认为这些动物
‎正在设法跟我们沟通呢

translation.en: Perhaps they're adapting to the changes around them in order to survive.
translation.zh:
‎也许它们正设法适应周围的环境
‎以努力生存下来

translation.en: Almost as if they're, I don't know, evolving or something.
translation.zh: ‎就像是在进化什么的 我也说不上来
‎放下 你们这两个水果圈

translation.en: and there's only gonna be one survivor, and that's me.
translation.zh:
‎只有一只动物能存活下来
‎那只动物就是我

translation.en: So, hand over that Time Flower.
-Nice Op Hop. -I learned from the best.
translation.zh:
‎-我们“奥普跳”做得不错
‎-跟你学的

translation.en: Dang, I always forget about this cliff.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 我老是忘记这边有个悬崖

translation.en: I might have one, and it's kind of an Op idea.
translation.zh:
‎我好像有个办法
‎还挺接近你的想法的

translation.en: You almost got us killed, Ed.
translation.zh: ‎你差点害死我们俩 艾德

translation.en: Is this how I make you feel all the time?
translation.zh: ‎原来这就是我一直给你的感觉吗？
‎算了 轮到时光花出场了

translation.en: Time Flowers. How many times did you hit your head on the way down?
translation.zh:
‎时光花 你掉下来的时候
‎头撞到多少次？

translation.en: Okay. Great. Now we have three Time Flowers.
translation.zh: ‎很好 如今我们手上有三朵时光花了

translation.en: Something other than lighting a boat on fire.
translation.zh: ‎除了点燃一艘船之外的方法

translation.en: -Do you think this will work? -I have no idea.
translation.zh:
‎-你觉得这个方法行得通吗？
‎-我也不清楚

translation.en: I got to get this bomb away from me.
my great-great-grandfather sailed here with the one and only Charles Darwin.
translation.zh:
‎我的曾曾祖父
‎曾跟绝无仅有的查尔斯达尔文 ‎一起在这里航行

translation.en: He claimed that there was an island here that exploded and completely vanished.
translation.zh:
‎他说这边有一座岛突然爆炸
‎瞬间从他们眼前彻底消失

translation.en: Yeah. I think I had a relative that did something like that, too.
translation.zh: ‎我记得我有个亲戚也说过这个故事

translation.en: Oh, or at least I'm alive.
Oh! Hoss and everybody, you're alive!
translation.zh: ‎霍斯 还有其他动物都活着！

translation.en: Yes, thanks to Op and Ed,
So... were you worried about me?
Burnie's trick on a grand scale. We used every Time Flower we could find
translation.zh:
‎我们只是放大伯尼的魔术
‎在炸弹引爆之前

translation.en: to make the whole island disappear before the boat went off.
translation.zh:
‎利用所有能弄到手的时光花
‎将整座岛变消失

translation.en: I was right about the flowers and the Cyclops.
translation.zh: ‎我对时光花和独眼巨人的理论是对的

translation.en: What else am I right about?
I'll just get back in that flower, and I'll keep trying again and again
translation.zh:
‎我只要再次钻进时光花
‎接连不断地使计

translation.en: You've been a very bad dog, Clarance.
translation.zh: ‎克拉伦斯 你最近很不乖

‎-我还没开始呢
‎-趴下 ‎等我搞定后…
‎求我 ‎…你就能感受到我的盛怒

translation.en: Oh, it's so good to see you and you, and you, and...
I think you should be asking "when" are--
Today, we celebrate the one-year anniversary of the greatest discovery of the 21st century,
translation.zh:
‎今天我们要庆祝
‎21世纪最伟大发现一周年

translation.en: a species once thought extinct, flummels.
translation.zh:
‎主角是菲拉萌
‎我们一度以为绝种的动物
‎没错 好抱可爱的菲拉萌

translation.en: brought to us by famed botanical astrophysicist, Dr. Lee Chung.
translation.zh:
‎由著名植物天体物理学家
‎钟利博士发现

translation.en: A recent survey shows that the average...
Oh, I'm so proud of you, Lee.
And you've been so much more talkative since your discovery.
translation.zh:
‎自从你有了新发现后
‎也变得比较健谈了

translation.en: Friend at the end again, eh? Nope.
Aww, and all without my help.
You and Dr. Chung visit any cool places lately?
translation.zh:
‎你和钟博士
‎最近有没有去了好玩的地方？

translation.en: It's been one amazing adventure after another.
[Ed] What did you guys end up doing with Clarance?
translation.zh: ‎你们后来怎么处置克拉伦斯？

translation.en: No dog should have a master.
So, on the count of three,
I say we tie up Shackleton, take his ship,
translation.zh:
‎我们一起把沙克尔顿绑起来
‎劫走他的船

translation.en: and head somewhere warm like Cabo.
translation.zh: ‎然后前往像卡波那种山温水暖的地方

translation.en: Okay. Okay. We can change it up.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我们大可换个地方

translation.en: They let dogs in the restaurants there. [yelps]
Ready or not, Hoss, here I come.
translation.zh: ‎霍斯 你准备好了吗？我来了

translation.en: And thanks for helping out, pals.
Well, how do you like this year's two flower floats?
translation.zh: ‎你们觉得今年百花节的花车怎么样？

translation.en: -[Op] Great. -[Ed] I look a little chunky.
I'm sorry your teeth are yellow. We ran out of white flowers.
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 你的牙齿是黄的
‎毕竟白花用光了

translation.en: Hey, Ed, I have a little surprise for you. Come with me.
translation.zh: ‎艾德 我有个小惊喜给你 跟我来吧

translation.en: Except I just remembered that I don't,
translation.zh: ‎但我刚想起我向来不喜欢惊喜

translation.en: so tell me what it is so I'm not too surprised.
translation.zh: ‎但我刚想起我向来不喜欢惊喜 ‎快说是什么 我不想太惊讶

translation.en: Don't worry, Ed. I'm sure you have plenty of time to prepare for--
translation.zh:
‎放心吧 艾德
‎我相信你一定有很充分的准备时间

translation.en: Op, I really don't know if I could handle another surprise today.
translation.zh: ‎我真的无法再承受另一个惊喜了

translation.en: Trust me. You're gonna love it.
translation.zh: ‎相信我 你一定会喜欢的

translation.en: Hey, I haven't seen you since, what, like 1835?
translation.zh: ‎嗨 我最后一次见到你是1835年

translation.en: There's so much to talk about.
You two keep going. I'll go get him a glass of water.
translation.zh: ‎你们继续聊 我去给他倒杯水
